title: Capella Payload Signature Verification Fails for custom testnet
body:
**Describe the bug**
I am trying to setup MEV components on top of the [kurtosis-tech/eth2-package](https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/eth2-package/pull/115) and I have got it to run but it only runs on a custom image with the following lines removed

https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost-relay/blob/b7095834a40cb871074c48d02a8ade83e8ab65a3/services/api/service.go#L1263-L1272

If I let it stay I get a bunch of errors complaining about `"could not verify capella payload signature"`. Note that err is nil, the response is !ok.

**Steps to reproduce**

1. `kurtosis run github.com/kurtosis-tech/eth2-package@gyani/mev-capella-errors`
2. Open the MEV website; and wait for slot 96/128
3. Look at the logs for mev-relay-api

**Expected behavior**
The errors don't happen and the payload gets delivered

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost-relay/assets/6670312/1ec205bf-95c0-4e24-896b-6b57358521f7)


**Which version are you using:**
- OSX - M1
- Kurtosis 0.81.5
- MEV Image - flashbots/mev-relay-api (latest)

@avalonche FYSA!
